statements: SELECT * FROM election_debates_schedule
SELECT debate_id, debate_topic, debate_date FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE debate_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT moderator_name, participant_1_name, participant_2_name FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE debate_topic LIKE '%election%'
SELECT * FROM election_debates_schedule ORDER BY debate_date DESC
SELECT moderator_name, participant_1_name, participant_2_name FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE moderator_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE debate_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY debate_date DESC;
SELECT debate_topic, moderator_name, participant_1_name FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE moderator_name = 'Anderson Cooper';
SELECT debate_topic, participant_1_name, participant_2_name FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE participant_1_name = 'Joe Biden' AND participant_2_name = 'Donald Trump';
SELECT * FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE debate_topic LIKE '%environment%' ORDER BY debate_date ASC;
SELECT debate_topic, debate_date FROM election_debates_schedule WHERE debate_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM debates;
SELECT debate_topic, debate_date FROM debates WHERE moderator IS NULL;
SELECT debate_topic, moderator FROM debates WHERE debate_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT debate_id, participant_name FROM participants WHERE participant_role='Opponent';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE debate_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM debates WHERE debate_topic = 'Gun Control' ORDER BY debate_date DESC;
SELECT debate_id, debate_topic, participant_name FROM debates JOIN participants ON debates.debate_id = participants.debate_id WHERE participant_role = 'Speaker' AND moderator = 'John Doe';
SELECT debate_topic, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM debates JOIN participants ON debates.debate_id = participants.debate_id GROUP BY debate_topic HAVING total_participants > 2;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_role = 'Moderator' ORDER BY participant_name ASC;
SELECT participant_name, debate_topic, debate_date FROM participants JOIN debates ON participants.debate_id = debates.debate_id WHERE debate_date > '2022-01-01' AND debate_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM debates_schedule;
SELECT debate_id, debate_topic FROM debates_schedule ORDER BY debate_id DESC;
SELECT debate_topic, debate_date FROM debates_schedule WHERE debate_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_type FROM participants WHERE participant_type = 'Student' ORDER BY participant_name;
SELECT dp.debate_id, p.participant_name FROM debate_participants dp JOIN participants p ON dp.participant_id = p.participant_id WHERE dp.debate_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM debates_schedule;
SELECT debate_id, debate_topic, debate_date FROM debates_schedule;
SELECT participant_name, participant_type FROM participants;
SELECT debate_id, debate_topic, debate_date, debate_time FROM debates_schedule WHERE debate_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT debate_id, debate_topic, debate_date, debate_time, participant_name, participant_type FROM debates_schedule JOIN debate_participants ON debates_schedule.debate_id = debate_participants.debate_id JOIN participants ON participants.participant_id = debate_participants.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM debates_schedule
SELECT debate_topic, debate_date FROM debates_schedule WHERE debate_id = 1
SELECT participant_name, participant_affiliation FROM participants
SELECT attendance_id, debate_id, participant_id FROM debate_attendance
SELECT question_text, question_category FROM debate_questions
SELECT * FROM debates_schedule WHERE debate_date >= '2023-09-01';
SELECT debate_topic, debate_date, debate_time FROM debates_schedule WHERE debate_id = 2;
SELECT participant_name, participant_affiliation FROM participants WHERE participant_affiliation = 'University';
SELECT * FROM debate_attendance WHERE debate_id = 5 AND attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT question_id, question_text, question_category FROM debate_questions WHERE debate_id = 3 ORDER BY question_category DESC;
SELECT * FROM debates;
SELECT debate_topic, debate_date FROM debates WHERE debate_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE participant_role = 'Speaker';
SELECT participant_name FROM participants ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_budget FROM sponsors WHERE sponsor_budget > 5000;

SELECT moderator_name FROM moderators WHERE debate_id=2;
